channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Weather Satellite To Supply New Data Ahead of Typhoon Season
item.description: Taiwan's first domestically made weather satellite, "Triton," will start sending back data on sea surface conditions in June, just in time for typhoon season.

item.title: Exhibition and Symposium in Washington Mark 45 Years of Taiwan Relations Act
item.description: Venues in Washington, D.C., are marking 45 years of the Taiwan Relations Act, the legal basis for the unofficial U.S.-Taiwan relationship.

item.title: Taipower Says More Nuclear Reactors Won't Lower Costs
item.description: Taiwan's state power company says bringing more nuclear reactors online will not reduce electricity prices for consumers.

item.title: Multiple Chinese Coast Guard and Other Vessels Enter Kinmen Waters
item.description: Around a dozen Chinese coast guard ships and other vessels entered waters near Taiwanâ€™s outlying Kinmen Islands, with some breaching prohibited waters.
